/usr/local/bin/g++-8   --std=c++17 -g  -isysroot /Applications/Xcode_10.3.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX10.14.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/OGLSample1_Triangle.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OGLSample1_Triangle.dir/sampleapp.cpp.o  -o OGLSample1_Triangle  -L/usr/local/lib -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib ../libs/OGLAppFramework/libOGLAppFramework.a -framework OpenGL -lglfw -lglbinding -lglbinding-aux -lpthread -ldl
